songs.title: Smart Girl

(Chorus)
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl

I want a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
I need a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)

Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl

(Tex James)
Im the black Zack Morris so she saved by the bell
Rest In Peace to the beat, Im bout to kill it
Send it Straight to hell
Head of her class plus she got a stupid booty

Careless if she white, atleast she got her mama booty
Now back it up and drop
It down, Back it up and drop it down
Make that thang clap, Now back it up and
Drop it down

She in the library, Gettin' her study on
Thinking about gettin' her freaky
On
She came ready with a skirt on, COMMANDO no pants on

I want a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
I need a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl

(B.o.B)
That booty dumb, that ass ain't got no sense (ayy)
But still it's smart enough to pay the rent
She got class like Taraji, But swole like Minajy
Might take a picture, put it up on Display
I need a smart girl, With a dumb booty
That thang so stupid, Cudda been on Clueless

That Thang dropped outta high school
That Thang gotta low IQ
Put Your hands up in the air
If your booty dumb and you 5'2

She hoppin' outta my Cadillac
Imma chop her down with that "Batallac"
Go head throw that fatty back
Show me where you tatted at

Booty so big, Muhfuckas trynaa fine you
Now dudes wanna wife you
And incase you forgot let me remind you

I want a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
I need a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl
Drop it like this, Drop it like this girl

Long Heels, Red Bottoms , ?? Boy Shorts
Loud pack in her dorm room
Told Ol' boy she at her mama house
She can't cook, Dont clean
She drink lean, and she smoke green
She dance in the house all by herself
Like she trying out for the Twerk Team

I gotta condo on my wrist
All my cars in my sister name
Im cashing out like im Cash Out
Everybody know im Tex James
I like a smart girl with a dumb booty
Where im from we call her Judy
It's so big, it don't make no sense
Super Stupid

I want a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
I need a smart girl, With a dumb booty(3X)
